attributes.action: Congestion --- Slash public transport costs in and around our citys and towns as a measure of reducing congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of wasting money on ludacrous over ambitious projects like 'road pricing'. Think about the problem from a national perspective less vehicles means less congestion. Public transport is proven yet in this counrty it is just as cheap for a taxi as it is for a bus. Not my idea of a green nation and certainly not helping the congestion in and around our towns and city's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
